emuInput.TitMainTitle: Eight members of Ebenezer Little Rens basketball team posed in gymnasium
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 22, 1941 reads: "Ebenezer's Cage Quintet- The above team is the Ebenezer Little Rens, one of the city's outstanding church quintets. Coached by Jesse Brown, former W. Va. State College star, the Little Rens have made an outstanding record this season. - Harris photo."
